title: ssh: TestTCPIPHTTP: ssh.Client: handshake failed: ssh: invalid packet length, packet too large
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

GOMAXPROCS=76 go test -short code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh...

What do you see instead?

--- FAIL: TestTCPIPHTTP-76 (0.01 seconds)
test_unix_test.go:139: 
test_unix_test.go:125: ssh.Client: handshake failed: ssh: invalid packet length, packet
too large
test_unix_test.go:139: 

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

8g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version devel +8cca28e940ea Sun May 05 02:23:19 2013 +0800 linux/386

go.crypto ecb6c1599438
